string.text:
- W/A/S/D to move and rotate 
 - Q to wait, R to shoot in direction 
 - To complete the level you have to reach the exit 
 - After every 5 levels you will visit trader and can upgrade some of your attributes for money 
 - Money is earned mainly from getting an artefact, small amount is gained from completing level or killing mutants 
 - Each level will contain 1 artefact, 1 medkit (restores 4 health) and 1 ammo (restores 6 ammo) 
 - Every 10 levels the difficulty will increase, maps will become more narrow, more anomalies and stronger mutants will spawn 
 - Bloodsucker mutant is invisible and appears only when near a few cells from player 
 - Chimera mutant can jump at player if no walls/objects on a way 
 - You can shoot through obstacles that aren't wall, such as water for example (chimera can jump over them too)
